thread.title: After three gloomy years, savers see light at end of the tunnel
thread.title_full: After three gloomy years, savers see light at end of the tunnel

title: After three gloomy years, savers see light at end of the tunnel
text:
After three gloomy years, savers see light at end of the tunnel Moneyfacts has found 172 savings rate increases since last month Getty Images Miles Costello Published 1 minute ago 
Hard-pressed savers are finally enjoying better returns on their deposits after three years of rock-bottom rates thanks to government intervention aimed at boosting economic growth, according to Moneyfacts. 
The finance expert, which specialises in finding the best deals for consumers, said yesterday that it had spotted 172 savings rate increases since last month, with some terms jumping by as much as 0.74 per cent. That compares with 73 rate reductions over the same period, Moneyfacts said, adding that its findings showed that some providers were offering the best deals available all year. 
The top one-year fixed-rate bond account is paying Subscribe now
